subject: Alpine Skiing
Fashion and Apparel
Skiing
X Games
World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games (2010)
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Athletes in snowboard cross and ski cross have long worn loose outerwear, but that has changed as more Alpine skiers have begun competing in the freestyle disciplines.
snippet: Athletes in snowboard cross and ski cross have long worn loose outerwear, but that has changed as more Alpine skiers have begun competing in the freestyle disciplines.
